Detailed Description

run and the generic run type i.e.

for cases where more than one calorimenter was present In addition a generic month info is stored which indicates the main or start (of a) running period

Author:
Götz Gaycken LLR (Ecole Polytechnique)
Date:
Oct 2006

Definition at line 36 of file RunLocation.hh.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CALICE::RunLocation::RunLocation ( LCObject *  obj  )  [inline]

'Copy constructor', create the RunLocation interface for the generic objects read from file/database.

The objects stored in the file or database are of type LCGenericObject. To generate the interface of the object RunLocation: 

 RunLocation a_module_location(lc_collection->getElementAt(index));
Todo:

Currenlty, there is no serious type checking. Only the number of integers, floats and doubles is used

to verify whether the LCGenericObject is of the type RunLocation
